It's not necessarily broken, and there's a toggle now for editor transparency since a lot of those IVAs were rather hard to work with in the editors. Frame rate goes from 30s to single digits with just one simply window transform and a bunch of RPM props, or it goes into the decimals with something like the ERS rover cockpit. I think it's part of the main RPM distribution now.
